pkgmetadata.longdescription: HaNS is a lightweight, pure Haskell network stack that can be used for Haskell networking in the context of the HaLVM, or with a Linux tap device. Currently, HaNS supports 802.3, IPv4, ARP, DHCP (partially), ICMP, UDP, and TCP.

use.flag: Use bounded channels for message passing.
Build the executable to run unit tests.
